titleInfo.title: The "Cameo principle'' and the origin of scale-free graphs in social networks

mods.abstract: We formulate a simple edge generation rule based on an inverse like mass action principle for random graphs over a structured vertex set. We show that under very weak assumptions on this structure one obtains a scale free distribution for the degree. We furthermore introduce and study a "my friends are your friends'' local search principle which makes the clustering coefficient large.
